description:
Explore and navigate the world with confidence using Google Maps. Find the best routes with live traffic data and real-time GPS navigation for driving, walking, cycling and public transport. Discover over 250 million businesses and places – from restaurants and shops to everyday essentials – with photos, reviews and helpful information.

Navigate the world, the way that you want:
• Get to where you need to go with fuel-efficient route options
• Find the best route with real-time, turn-by-turn voice and on-screen navigation
• Save time with automatic rerouting based on live traffic, incidents and road closures
• Catch the bus, train and ride-share effortlessly, with real-time updates
• Find bike or scooter rentals to get around more easily

Plan trips and experiences effortlessly:
• Preview an area before you go (e.g. parking, entrances) with Street View
• Use Immersive View to experience what landmarks, parks and routes look like, and even check the weather so that you can be ready in advance
• Create custom lists of your favourite saved places and share with others
• Order delivery and takeaway, make reservations and book hotels
• Don't get lost with offline maps in an area with bad signal
• Search for local places and things to do, and decide based on user reviews and photos

Discover and explore like a local:
• Explore with confidence knowing 500 million users contribute and keep the map up to date each year
• Avoid the crowds by seeing how busy a place is before you get there
• Use Lens in Maps to see walking directions overlaid on the real world
• Filter restaurants by cuisine, hours, price, rating and more
• Ask questions about a place, from dishes to parking, and get quick answers

Some features not available in all countries or cities
Navigation isn't intended to be used by oversized or emergency vehicles

Know what's ahead on the road with the help from other drivers. Waze is a live map that harnesses the local knowledge of tens of millions of drivers around the world. Drivers safely and confidently reach their everyday destinations thanks to Waze map’s GPS navigation, live traffic updates, real-time safety alerts (including roadworks, accidents, crashes, police, potholes and more) and accurate ETAs.


Make your next drive more predictable and stress-free:
• Get there faster with real-time directions, accurate ETAs and automatic rerouting based on live traffic, incidents and road closures
• Even if you know the way, avoid surprises on the road ahead with safety alerts for accidents, crashes, roadworks, objects on the road, potholes, speed bumps, sharp curves, bad weather, emergency vehicles, railway crossings and more
• Steer clear of tickets by knowing where police and red light and speed cameras are located
• Share what’s happening on the road with other drivers by reporting live incidents and hazards
• Stay informed of upcoming speed limit changes, and keep your speedometer in check
• Know which lane to be in with multi-lane guidance
• See toll pricing and choose to avoid tolls along your routes
• Add road passes and vignettes for HOV lanes and restricted traffic zones
• Find petrol/fuel stations and prices and EV charging stations along your route
• Locate car parks near your destination
• Use voice-guided turn-by-turn navigation from a variety of languages, local accents and your favourite celebrities
• Plan your next drive by checking ETAs by future departure or arrival times
• Use your favourite audio apps (for podcasts, music, news, audiobooks) directly within Waze
• Sync Waze to your car’s built-in display through Apple CarPlay


* Some features are not available in all countries


* Waze navigation is not intended for emergency or oversized vehicles


You can manage your in-app Waze privacy settings at any time. Learn more about the Waze privacy policy here, www.waze.com/legal/privacy.

Moovit is one app for all your urban mobility and transport rides!

Dailymail - "This travel app is a godsend for anyone using public transport – with live updates to bus schedules, as well as a great route-planner for cities across the UK."

Transportation is an integral part of urban living. Whether you ride the train, subway/underground /tube, bus, light rail, ferry or metro, use bikes, ride-sharing like Uber, getting the best urban mobility information is critical. Moovit guides you from point A to B in the easiest and most efficient way. Get train and bus times, maps, and live arrival times with ease so you can plan your trip with confidence. Find critical alerts and service disruptions for your favorite lines. Get step-by-step directions of optimal route bus, train, metro, bike or a combination of them. 
This is why Moovit has been named one of the best apps of the year 2017 by the App Store!

Moovit guides more than 865 million users in over 3200 cities throughout the world.

► Journey Planner that combines you all transport options and gives you the best route with live arrivals.

► Live Directions: Get step-by-step directions with live guidance as you travel: know exactly how long you need to walk to your station, how long you’re waiting, view the arrival time of your line and how many stops are left. 

► Real time arrivals. View real-time arrival updates, which are taken directly from GPS devices positioned on buses and trains.

► Real time alerts. Know about issues ahead of time by receiving service alerts such as emergency or unexpected disruptions, delays, traffic jams, new construction and more...

► Users reports. Moovit’s users report issues found with stations, line service, and timetables so that we can inform all nearby riders about what’s going on in their area.

► Favorite lines, stations, and places. Get easy access to lines, stations, and places you ride and visit all the time. Plus, get real-time updates if/when there are changes to your favorite lines in case your bus or train time is impacted!

► Bike routes. Get bike routes in addition to the bus, subway, train, or metro trip plans. If you ride bikes (yours or shared) we can plan a route that includes the train or bus. 
Bike docking stations are updated in real-time.

► Maps view. View all stations, routes, and lines on the subway or bus map. Additionally, maps are available in PDF for when you’re offline, or underground on the subway. 

Ride with Moovit in all major cities:

UK:
• London
• Manchester
• Birmingham
• Leeds
• Edinburgh
• Glasgow
• Liverpool
• Sheffield

Ireland:
• Dublin and all of the Republic of Ireland. 

Moovit supports all major transit:

UK:
• TFL - Bus, Tube, DLR, Overground, Ferry (River Bus), Tfl Rail, Tram, Coach
• National Express
• National Rail
• Arriva
• First
• Stagecoach and more...

Ireland:
• Bus Eireann
• Dublin Bus
• Irish Rail
• Luas
• Kenneally’s Bus Service and more…

Bike sharing provided by:
• Santander Cycles in London
• BelfastBikes in Belfast
• Bike in Bath
• Nextbike in Glasgow

India:
•Delhi: Delhi Metro (DMRC), Delhi Buses (DTC), Northern Railways (NR)
•Mumbai: Mumbai Metro (M.M.R.D.A), all buses: BEST, NMMT, KDMT, VVMT, MBMT, KMT, TMT, Ferries and more
•Bangalore: Namma Metro, B.M.T.C (buses and metro feeder routes), South Western Railways
•Chennai: Chennai Metro Rail, all buses - Metropolitan Transport Corporation (MTA)
•Ahmedabad: A.M.T.S, Bus Rapid Transport System (BRTS), V.T.C.O.S 
•Pune: Indian Railways, Pune Local Central Railways, Pune Mahanagar Parivahan Mahaman.

Singapore:
• MRT, LRT, bus, tram, cable car & shuttle buses. Service provided by:
• SBS
• SMRT
• Tower Transit
• Go-Ahead Singapore

You ride, we guide!

Feel free to contact us:

https://moovitapp.zendesk.com/hc/requests/new
moovit@Facebook, Twitter

Terms of Use
https://moovitapp.com/en-us/legal/terms-of-service-en

egg – the ultimate public transport experience in Israel!
All you need for a smooth, safe, and personalized ride – with no ads:

- Smart route planning & live navigation
Get tailored routes with live arrival times and updated stops.

- Digital payments – fast & secure
Pay directly from your phone – no Rav-Kav needed. Quick, safe, no prepayment. Just scan a QR code and get an instant digital ticket.

- Personalized discounts
Benefits for eligible riders: students, soldiers, seniors, and more.

- Always ad-free
A clean, focused travel experience.

- Rav-Kav top-up & balance check
Easily recharge your card or load discounts. Available on iPhone 8+ with iOS 16 or later.

- Tickets booking for Egged intercity buses (including Eilat)
Reserve tickets ahead of time, store them in the app, and abroad with confidence.

- All your tickets in one place
Access your digital tickets anytime – ready for your ride.

- Customer service & support
Contact support directly and enjoy fast, professional assistance.

Download egg now and enjoy a smarter, easier, and safer ride with everything you need in one app.

developer: Government Of Israel Ministry Of Defense
description:
ZUZU – The Public Transportation App for Soldiers, Now Not Only in the Browser but in a Brand-New App!

With ZUZU, IDF soldiers can easily and quickly validate their trips on all public transportation in Israel.

We are here for you:
Phone: 03-9576888
Help screen in the app

Have a safe and pleasant journey!

Rav-Pass: Taking public transit rides has never been easier. Plan your trip with real time schedule updates and pay directly from your mobile device


Pay directly from your phone - no cash and "smart" cards required, just take your phone to your next ride and scan the QR code onboard.
With Rav-Pass you can pay in any bus, train & light rail in Israel and enjoy daily and monthly discounts without upfront payments. 

Prefer using Rav-Kav? No problem! Top it up with your iPhone. Tap the Rav-Kav card near the camera area on your device (back or front), select the contract you want, pay using all major credit and debit cards. Tap again to complete the topup and you're ready for your next journey!

You can choose between Credit value which is acceptable by all public transit operators in Israel, or a Daily and Monthly passes according to the area of your travel.

Rav-Pass is an official public transportation payment app licensed by the Ministry of transportation in Israel. 
Rav Kav top up is available on iPhone 7 and above with iOS13+ 

We'd love to hear your feedback support@ravpass.co.il

Safe journeys, 
HopOn Rav-Pass Team

אפליקציית התחבורה הציבורית המתקדמת והמדוייקת בישראל המשתמשת בג׳יפיאס המותקן על גבי האוטובוסים והרכבות כדי לספק זמני הגעה מדוייקים ומסלולי ניווט המעודכנים בזמן אמת. 

איך זה עובד?

האפליקציה תאתר את תחנות האוטובוסים והרכבות בסביבתכם ותציג מיד את זמני ההגעה של הקווים לתחנות. השתמשו בחיפוש (לחיצה על זכוכית המגדלת בחלקו העליון של המסך) כדי לחפש מסלולי הגעה אפשריים מנקודה לנקודה ולקבל הוראות ניווט מדוייקות לכל מסלול.

בחירת קו במסך הראשי או דרך החיפוש תיקח אתכם למסך פרטי הקו שם תוכלו לגלות בדיוק איפה האוטובוס על המפה ולקבל מידע מפורט על מסלול ותחנות הקו, לוחות זמנים לכל תחנה, כיווני נסיעה וחלופות, ומיקום בזמן אמת של האוטובוסים לאורך המסלול.

באוטובוס קרוב תוכלו למצוא מידע מקיף ומעודכן על כל קווי התחבורה הציבורית, קווי הלילה וקווי התלמידים של אגד , אגד תעבורה , רכבת ישראל , דן , דן בדרום ,  דן באר-שבע , קווים , מטרופולין , סופרבוס , אלקטרה אפיקים , תנופה , אקסטרה , נתיב אקספרס , נסיעות ותיירות נצרת , שירותי אוטובוס מאוחדים (ש.א.מ) , ג‘יבי טורס , גלים , גולן , אילות , מטרונית , כרמלית , רכבלית , מוניות שירות, נעים בסופש סבבוס וקווי החוף - תחבורת סוף השבוע של איזור המרכז, כפיר מפעילת הרכבת הקלה בירושלים, הרכבת הקלה בתל-אביב (תבל - דנקל), ומפעילי התחבורה הציבורית במזרח ירושלים.

האפליקציה כוללת סורק כרטיסי רב-קו מובנה אשר ייתן לכם מידע מקיף על יתרת ערך צבור ותוקף הכרטיסים המוטענים על הכרטיס. אם נגמר לכם הכסף או המנוי ואתם צריכים טעינה תוכלו למצוא על המפה באפליקציה את בתי העסק שתוכלו לטעון בהם כרטיסי רב קו במזומן ואשראי.

זמני הגעת הקווים המופיעים באפליקציה בצבע ירוק הינם זמני אמת המבוססים על איכון מכשירי הג'י.פי.אס המותקנים באוטובוסים. זמנים בצבע שחור מבוססים על לוח זמנים מתוכנן של נסיעות עתידיות או שאין לגביהן מידע זמן אמת.

למידע נוסף ותמיכה אתם מוזמנים ליצור איתנו קשר באינסטגרם , פייסבוק ובאימייל דרך התפריט במסך הראשי של האפליקציה.

כדי לכסות את עלויות התפעול של האפליקציה ולהמשיך לספק לכם שירות איכותי, משולבות באפליקציה פרסומות. ניתן להסירן ולתמוך ב״אוטובוס קרוב״ על ידי רכישת  מנוי לאוטובוס קרוב ללא פרסומות בעלות של 7.90 ש"ח ל-3 חודשים.
העלות עשויה להשתנות לפי מדינה ומטבע התשלום.
התשלום יחוייב מחשבון האייטיונס לאחר אישור הרכישה. המנוי יתחדש באופן אוטומטי אלא אם בוטל החידוש לפחות 24 שעות לפני סוף התקופה. החשבון יחוייב שוב 24 שעות לפני תום התקופה הנוכחית. ניתן לבטל את החידוש האוטומטי דרך הגדרות חשבון המשתמש בחשבון האייטיונס.

---------------------------------

Bus Nearby locates bus stops near you and shows accurate departure time of routes passing by. Using the search functionality of the app you can also also locate line information, stations , Rav-kav top up locations and navigation directions using public transportation in Israel. English is fully supported on both interface and transit information.  Real time schedule updates and navigation information is available from the following Israeli public transportation agencies: Israel Railways , Egged , Egged Taavura , Dan , Dan Badarom , Dan Beer-Sheva, , Kavim , Metropoline ,  Superbus , Elektra Afikim , Extra , Nateeve Express , Nazareth Transport & Tourism , UNBS , GB Tours , Galim , Golan , Eilot , Metronit Carmelit & Rachbalit in Haifa , Tel-Aviv area weekend bus service , Kfir - Jerusalem Light rail and East Jerusalem bus companies

If you like the app, please support us by subscribing to Bus Nearby Premium Free of Ads:
Subscription price is 7.90 ILS for a period of 3 month.
Prices may vary by location.
If you choose to upgrade to a Premium subscription, payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the iTunes Store after purchase.

Terms of Use & Privacy Policy: https://busnearby.co.il/static/busnearby-eula-privacypolicy.pdf

Mapeak is a powerful, yet simple to use, navigation and route-planning tool for the outdoors.
Geared towards hikers, bikers and off-road drivers it keeps you oriented in the Israeli backcountry even with no cellular reception.Use crisp topographic maps to navigate, familiarize with nearby points of interest, plan, import and share routes, synchronize effortlessly with our trip-planning site and much more.

Here’s what you get for free:
Maps
- Vector maps with unlimited zoom with no loss of quality
- A hiking map, complete with blazed trails
- A biking map, compete with single tracks marked for difficulty and marked bike routes
- Hebrew and English versions of all maps
- Text labels that orient to the viewers’ perspective
- A satellite image
- Transparent map overlays to show topography and trails over the satellite image
Depth perception
- High resolution contour lines based on spatial data from NASA
- Dynamic hill-shading which changes as the map rotates for accurate depth perception at a glance
- 3D models of many buildings in urban areas

Navigation
- Show your position and direction
- Orient the map north or in your direction of movement
- Record your path as you travel
- Analyze your speed and distance traveled

Routes
- Search for nearby routes for walking, driving and biking
- Plan your own routes – they would automatically follow the roads and paths on the map
- Manipulate routes – reverse, split or merge them at will
- Handle several routes at once
- Effortlessly synchronize with the routes you plan on our website
- Share routes or save them on your phone
- Analyze the height profile of routes

Points of Interest
- An extensive list of historical sites, tourist attractions, campsites, springs and viewpoints to visit
- Easy access to geo-located articles from Wikipedia and iNature
- Easily add your own POIs to the map


Offline Map Purchase:
You can buy a yearly subscription to our offline maps. Use them when you are out of reception or want to save your battery. The maps are continuously updated.

For EULA see: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

היי! 
נעים להכיר, ON – האפליקציה האולטימטיבית לטעינת רכבים חשמליים!
מתיחת פנים ושדרוג לאפליקציית Afcon EV (אפקון טעינה חשמלית) המוכרת. 

רשת המהירה הגדולה ביותר של עמדות טעינה ציבוריות לרכב חשמלי בישראל* 
דאגנו לך עם עמדות טעינה לרכב חשמלי ואפשרות טעינה מהירה לרכב חשמלי בכל מקום בארץ! עמדות הטעינה שלנו נמצאות במיקומים נוחים בתחנות דלק בצירים ראשיים, במרכזי קניות, חללי עבודה, ברחבי ערים, מסעדות, מרכזים רפואיים, מוסדות אקדמיים, מלונות ועוד. 
זו לא סתם עוד אפליקציה לטעינת רכב חשמלי, ב-ON ניתן לראות מראש את מיקום העמדה, הנחיות כיצד להגיע אליה וכן מידע בזמן אמת אודות זמינות, תקינות ועלות הטעינה בעמדה המסוימת. בנוסף, ניתן להתחיל ולסיים את הטעינה בלחיצת כפתור פשוטה, להזין פרטי אשראי כך שהחיוב ייעשה באופן אוטומטי, לצפות בהיסטורית חיובים, לפתוח קריאת שירות, ועוד!
סידרנו לך ראש שקט וביטחון שיש בקרבתך מטען מעולה – אז אפשר להתחיל לט-!ON

סוללה תמיד במצב ON 
נקודות הטעינה לרכב חשמלי ברשת ON מציגות מגוון קצבי טעינה שיתאימו לכל שימוש, ביניהן מאות עמדות טעינה סופר מהירות ואולטרה מהירות (עד 360KW). בנוסף, ברשת ON יש המון מתחמי טעינה מרובי נקודות טעינה שיבטיחו שתור הטעינה שלכם יגיע בקלות ובמהירות. 
שימו לב שכל עמדות הטעינה המהירות מגיעות עם כבל טעינה לרכב חשמלי מובנה בעמדה, ולעומת זאת בעמדות AC צריך לבדוק מראש באפליקציה האם יש או אין כבל בעמדה ולהצטייד בכבל במידת הצורך.
שירות מקצועי ואיכותי 24/7 מלווה את הטעינה שלכם באפליקציית ON  ויבטיח שתמיד תהיה לכם אנרגיה בסוללה.

המ-ON הטבות 
עולם שלם של הטבות ופינוקים למימוש בזמן טעינת הרכב החשמלי ובכלל! 
זו הדרך שלנו להגיד לכם תודה שבחרתם בנו! 

שומרים על הכדור 
כשטוענים באפליקציית ON לטעינת רכבים חשמליים לא רק נהנים מנוחות, קצב טעינה מהיר, שירות מעולה והטבות אלא גם עוזרים לשמור על הסביבה ירוקה! במהלך שנות פעילות אפקון טעינה חשמלית – היום רשת ON – נחסכו טונות של CO2!

בקיצור, בעיר, בכפר, בטיולים בשטח או במלון, בעבודה או בדרכים - אפליקציית טעינת הרכבים החשמליים שלנו היא הפתרון שלך, כי הגיע הזמן להצטרף למהפכה החשמלית ולהפוך את הטעינה לפשוטה יותר!
הורידו את האפליקציה עכשיו וצאו לדרך! 
* בהתאם לדו"ח BDO נובמבר 2023: רשת הטעינה הציבורית בעלת מספר עמדות הטעינה המהירות (DC) הגדול ביותר".

developer: E. V. I. ELECTRIC CARS LTD
description:
ברוכים הבאים למהפכת הרכב החשמלי בישראל!
סונול EVI, מהחברות המובילות בישראל לתשתיות טעינה חשמליות, עם פריסה ארצית של מטענים במיקומים נבחרים. באמצעות היישומון של סונול EVI תוכלו להטעין את רכבכם בנוחות ובמהירות מירבית. היישומון מאפשר לאתר את המיקום והזמינות של המטענים בסביבה הקרובה ולנווט לשם. מספר נקודות הטעינה ברשת הציבורית של סונול EVI גדל בכל חודש!
היישומון מאפשר גישה לשירותים הבאים:
-	עמדות טעינה מהירות KW22 (AC) ואולטרה מהירות KW50-150  (DC)
-	מפת טעינה ארצית המציגה את זמינות המטענים בזמן אמת
-	ניווט למטען קרוב 
-	הזמנת מטען מראש
-	התחלה והפסקת טעינה ישירות מהנייד
-	צפייה בחשבוניות והיסטורית הטעינה
-	גישה וניהול חשבון אישי, אמצעי זיהוי ואמצעי תשלום
-	קבלת התראות לנייד

גרסת מערכת הפעלה מינימלית נתמכת היא iOS 15
Amud Anan is a community project for creating an online and offline tour guide and geographic encyclopedia of Israel.

Meet off-road great navigation application for your off-road trips. record plan and share tracks.
off-line maps (Israel for now) group navigation - all members on the map. broadcast your trip in real time, share it on Facebook and more.

WienMobil: The city at your fingertips with a single app. The official app of Wiener Linien helps you to arrive at your destination quickly. Île-de-France Mobilités is here to assist you daily. Purchase a digital ticket, recharge your Navigo pass, search for routes including trains, RERs, metros, trams, buses, coaches, bicycles, Vélib', car-sharing, or car rentals. Find schedules in real-time or traffic information... Discover essential tools and information for organizing your travels in Île-de-France. Together, let's travel with ease.

Avoid queues at stations: buy your transport tickets from your iPhone!
The following tickets are available for purchase:

- Metro-Train tickets or Bus-Tram Ticket
- One Way from/to Airports (you cannot purchase this ticket if you already have a Metro-Train Ticket charged on your device)
- Navigo daily (this fare doesn’t permit you to go to airports), weekly, or monthly passes
- Special fares (Anti-pollution pass, Paris-Visit Passes etc.)
- Daily Vélib’ passes

Purchased tickets can then be (depending on the chosen purchasing path):

- Stored on the iPhone and validated directly at stations (from iPhone Xr and iOS 17.5)
- Loaded onto your Navigo pass (from an iPhone 7, with at least iOS 13. iPhone XR and XS are compatible starting from iOS 14.5)

For compatible tickets (Metro-Train and Bus-Tram Tickets, Navigo Day passes, special fares), no account is needed, and you can pay directly with Apple Pay!

You can prepare and plan your travels:

- Find nearby bus stops, train stations, and metro stations
- Search for real-time public transport routes, car-sharing, and bicycle routes
- Save upcoming trips in your phone’s calendar
- Check the next departures for your lines in real-time and all the timetable information
- View maps of public transport networks (accessible even offline)
- Follow pedestrian routes for walking segment

Stay informed and anticipate disruptions:

- Check your lines’ Twitter feed for real-time traffic updates
- Get alerts for disruptions on your favorite lines and routes
- Stay updated on the status of elevators in the stations you use

Customize your travel:

- Save your destinations (work, home, gym, etc.), stations, and stops as favorites
- Customize your profile (fast walker, with difficulties, reduced mobility, etc.)
- Select lines or stations to avoid

Prefer soft or alternative modes of transport:

- Book car-sharing and/or ride-sharing trips in partnership with leading providers
- Opt for bicycle routes for all your trips
- Rent a car or a van for a short period by choosing a Communauto car-sharing vehicle from a wide selection of stations around you and book it immediately for the duration of your choice.
--
Already using the Île-de-France Mobilités app and enjoying its services? Let us know with a 5-star rating!
Experiencing bugs or having feedback to give? Help us improve by sending your suggestions through the contact form available via the personal space.

Qibla Compass: Accurate & Instant Qibla Direction wherever you are!

Why Qibla Compass is Your Essential Prayer Companion:
- The compass automatically adjusts based on your current location, providing a precise Qibla direction every time.
- Use your device’s camera to view the Qibla direction in your surroundings.
- Rotate your device to calibrate the compass for accurate readings.
- Choose from multiple color themes to match your style, with full dark mode support.
- Launch directly from Control Center for quick access.
- A simple & minimal design for a focused experience.

Download Qibla Compass today and pray with confidence—anywhere, anytime!

description:
To find Qibla direction, you don't need an internet connection! Low size app that shows 100% Qibla Direction worldwide. Simple & Smart Qibla compass.

100% Qibla Finder helps muslims to find Qibla direction all around the World. The direction of Kaaba in Mecca (Makkah) is pointed out with an arrow on the map, so that you can adjust your direction before you start your prayer.

You do not need internet to see where the Qibla is. 100% Qibla Finder shows you where the Qibla is even on offline mode with the help of its compass feature.

Your direction is located accurately through the GPS feature in the app.

You can re-detect your location with “Find my location” feature to be sure about directions.

You can share 100% Prayer and Qibla app on Facebook and other Social Networks with your friends.

You need to hold your phone on a flat surface and keep it away from electromagnetic fields and metal objects. If it is necessary, you can manually re-arrange your location by pressing the marker.

Additional features include:

- Select from various map or compass modes

- Customize your location marker

- Locate the nearest mosques to your current location

Download Qibla Finder 100% now!

Privacy & Terms : https://www.muslimassistant.com/privacy-terms.html

Alto: Trail Navigation & Activity Tracker

Navigate trails with precision, track outdoor activities, and explore new paths with professional GPS technology and detailed mapping tools—your ultimate companion for every adventure.
Navigate with Confidence
Alto transforms your iPhone into a reliable outdoor navigation system. Track hiking, cycling, skiing, and walking adventures with accurate GPS positioning and comprehensive trail data. Whether you're summiting mountain peaks or exploring city streets, Alto delivers the precision you need.
Key Features

Professional GPS Navigation

Real-time activity tracking with smart altitude correction
Comprehensive performance metrics and statistics
GPX import/export for seamless route sharing

Rich Mapping Experience

Multiple map types: topographic, satellite, OpenStreetMap, and more
Offline maps for adventures beyond cell service (Pro)

Dual-Mode Altimeter
Accurate elevation tracking with our innovative system that combines GPS and barometric sensors—reliable data whether you're indoors or on the trail.
Smart Planning Tools

Precise coordinate finder
Built-in compass and weather integration

Thousands of Trails
Access a vast database of user-shared routes and contribute your own discoveries to help the outdoor community explore safely.
Perfect for Every Adventure
Hikers & Trekkers: Navigate confidently with precise elevation data and topographic maps designed for mountain terrain.
Cyclists: Track road and mountain biking with detailed metrics and intelligent route optimization.
Winter Sports: Monitor skiing and snowboarding with accurate altitude and speed tracking.
Urban Explorers: Discover walking tours and city adventures with comprehensive mapping.
Alto Pro
Unlock the full power of Alto:

Complete offline map library for remote adventures
Satellite and specialized map layers
Dark mode for low-light navigation

Need help? We're here for you:

Support Guide: altlas-app.com/support
Email: erol1apps@gmail.com
Website: https://altlas-app.com

For terms of service, visit: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/us/terms.html

Download Alto today and join thousands of outdoor enthusiasts who trust our navigation technology for their adventures.

Instantly compare your travel options in real-time across all transport modes globally, with live departures and bus locations!

Easily navigate your area with turn-by-turn directions for all your public transport, walking, cycling and scooter trips. 

THOUSANDS OF 5 STAR REVIEWS

* "Life changing. This app really changes the way you travel."
* "The only true five star app."
* "BEST TRANSPORT APP EVER."
* "It's become a weird and possibly sad fact of my life that waiting and receiving Citymapper updates have overtaken Christmases and birthdays on the anticipation and excitometer."

FIND THE BEST ROUTE ► Simple trip planning combining all transport modes: bus, tube, train, tram, ferry, cabs, rideshare, carshare, bike hire, e-scooters and walking. Discover routes you never knew existed

HIT THE GO BUTTON FOR STEP-BY-STEP DIRECTIONS ► Turn-by-turn navigation for all your transport, walking, personal cycling, bike shares and scooter trips. Choose between 3 different map views, see the charge levels of e-bikes around you, we even help you avoid no-parking zones. We take care of the logistical thinking so you are free to enjoy the ride

BEAT THE RUSH HOUR CROWD ► Live wait times and ETA so you'll never miss a bus, train or tram again. Follow your bus / train as it's approaching on a real-time map, see the best carriage to board, get alerted when it's time to get off, and get in and out from the best exit at any underground / train station 

PERSONALISE YOUR APP ► Save Home, Work and your go-to stops or stations for lightning fast trip planning. Subscribe to your favourite tube, train, bus or tram line for automatic disruption, delay, and status alerts

GET SOCIAL ► Share your live trip: let friends follow your live trip to know when you'll arrive. Share any location or address: one tap for others to get directions

TRAVEL OFFLINE ► Access offline the official TfL underground map and many other local network maps

EXPERIENCE ONE-STOP-SHOP MOBILITY ► Compare cab fares, hail a ride, grab the closest carshare, hop on a shared bike all from within the app. Our partners include: Uber, Gett, Zipcar, Ola, Getaround, FREENOW, LIME, Santander Cycles, Forest, Beryl, Anywheel

COVERAGE ► London and the South East | Birmingham and the Midlands | Manchester | Liverpool | Yorkshire | Edinburgh | Dublin | Paris | New York | Singapore | Taiwan | Hong Kong | Los Angeles | Barcelona | Berlin | Rome | Madrid | Hamburg | Milan | Stockholm | Chicago | Toronto | Sydney + many more in the UK worldwide!

PUBLIC TRANSPORT AGENCIES ► We use open data from public transport agencies including:

UK WIDE | National Rail, Arriva, Stagecoach, First bus
LONDON | TfL (Transport for London), Underground, Overground, Docklands Light Railway (DLR), Tramlink 
MANCHESTER | TfGM (Transport for Greater Manchester), Manchester Metrolink 
LIVERPOOL | Merseytravel, Merseyrail
YORKSHIRE | WYCA (West Yorkshire Combined Authority), SYPTE (South Yorkshire Public Transport Executive), Sheffield Supertram
WEST MIDLANDS | TfWM (Transport for West Midlands), West Midlands Railway, Midland Metro, National Express West Midlands, National Express Coventry, Travel Telford, Worcestershire County Council, Diamond Bus
NOTTINGHAM | NCT, NET
EDINBURGH | TfE, Lothian Bus, Edinburgh Tram
GLASGOW | SPT
BRISTOL | Travelwest, MetroBus, Bristol Ferries
CARDIFF | Transport for Wales, Cardiff Bus
NEWCASTLE | NEXUS, Tyne and Wear Metro
BRIGHTON | Brighton & Hove Buses
DUBLIN | TFI, NTA, Bus Éireann, Dublin Bus, Iarnród Éireann (Irish Rail)
HONG KONG | MTR, HK Tramways, Light Rail, Kowloon Motor Bus, Citybus, First Bus, First Ferry, Star Ferry, Discovery Bay Ferry & Bus, Park Island Ferry & Bus, Green Mini Bus
SINGAPORE | LTA, SMRT, SBS

KEEP IN TOUCH ► Questions, feedback or something we have missed in your city? Email us at support@citymapper.com

Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/Citymapper
Visit our website: http://citymapper.com

Bonjour RATP is the essential app for all your journeys in Île-de-France.
Plan your trips, check live traffic, purchase your tickets, and discover all mobility alternatives around you - metro, RER, bus, tram, Transilien trains, and self-service bikes.

Your routes across all networks.
Metro, RER, bus, tramway, Transilien SNCF trains, Optile… Wherever you are, Bonjour RATP finds the best journey to get you around the entire region.

Journeys tailored to you. 
Customize your search according to your preferences:
- Avoid certain lines or stations,
- Prioritize your preferred modes (metro, RER, Transilien, bus…),
- Minimize transfers or favor accessible routes.
Because every resident of Île-de-France has their own way of traveling.

Real-time traffic and personalized alerts.
Check the network status at a glance and receive real-time alerts in case of disruptions on your favorite lines across the entire Île-de-France network.

All your tickets in your pocket.

- Navigo Month
- Navigo Week
- Navigo Day
- Metro-Train-RER tickets
- Bus-Tram tickets

- Special tickets (Music Festival, Anti-pollution pass...)

Always on time.

Speak and go (Beta)
Just say where you want to go, and Bonjour RATP takes care of the rest!
Voice search makes your journeys even easier.

Bike sharing

Get Turn by Turn GPS Driving Directions and Best Route to Your Destination with GPS Route Finder & Voice Maps Navigation App!

GPS Route Finder & Voice MAPS is an easy to use GPS Navigation and route finder app that will help you reach your places using the shortest route. Use the MAPS app to find turn by turn driving directions and navigation to your destined place. It accurately displays the estimated time, distance and routes to your destination so you can find out the optimized way going to your home.

Here are the main benefits of using this GPS Route Finder & Maps app:

- Finds the best traffic free routes to your destination on maps
- Gives accurate time to reach your destination on maps
- By simply putting the start and end location, GPS Route Finder & Maps app will give you driving directions from start location to the destination
- Has a SPEEDOMETER that enables you to keep a check on your speed limit while driving
- Gives you multiple routes and allows you to change route anytime by simply taping on the alternative routes on map
- Access Nearby Places easily
- Has GPS Location Camera feature to help you take memorable photos with location Tags

GPS Route Finder & Navigation APP Features

Here are the top features of MAPS and Voice Navigation app:

Accurate Driving Directions – Gives you step-by-step walking or live driving directions to your destination and helps you avoid traffic with optimized routes. The driving directions are written turn by turn and also in voice.

Route Finder – Route Planner can find you an optimize route so you spend less time driving and more time doing. Gets you maximum routes to your location and will optimize traveling on the go. MAPS & Voice Navigation works as a route finder app. Finds routes to your destination and helps you travel through the easiest and shortest route to your destination.

Speedometer – The app consist of route finder speedometer. The speedometer lets you keep an eye on the speed of your vehicle in real-time so you do not over speed. Keep an eye on Speedometer while driving so you can prevent speed penalties.

Nearby Places - Easily search destinations, explore what's nearby, or find any place in a single click. Through this app, you can find, nearby restaurants, nearby ATM machines and banks, nearby hotels, nearby CNG and Petrol filling stations, nearby Cinemas and theaters, nearby parlor, etc.
GPS Camera – The GPS camera feature enables you to geotag your photos with the locations coordinates while making memories.


How to Use MAPS & Navigation APP:

The application is simple to use. All you need is to:

- Turn on your Location
- Open the Application, it will automatically detect your current location
- Enter the destination location to navigate
- The app will find you the route to your destination and will highlight the shortest and easiest route to your destination
- Start driving and follow the app driving directions on the go
- You will reach your destination using the driving directions and route finder

So install this application and navigate to your destination quicker and safer with accurate voice gps driving directions.
APS is an easy to use GPS Navigation app that will give help you reach your places using the shortest route. Use the MAPS app to find turn by turn driving directions and navigation to your destined place. It accurately displays the estimated time, distance and routes to your destination so you can find out the optimized way going to your home.

developer: NTA METROPOLITAN MASS TRANSIT SYSTEM LTD
description:
ברוכים הבאים לאפליקציית דנקל – הקו האדום של גוש דן. 
רוצים לחוות את הנוחות והזמינות של הרכבת הקלה של גוש דן, זו כנראה הולכת להיות האפליקציה הכי חשובה שתבחרו להתקין במכשירכם. 

הקו האדום של הרכבת הקלה הינו הקו הראשון של מערכת תחבורה עתירת נוסעים העובר באזורים העמוסים ביותר במטרופולין גוש דן בערים בת ים, תל אביב יפו, רמת גן, בני ברק ופתח תקווה.

הקו האדום משרת את מספר הנוסעים הגדול ביותר ביחס לקווי הרכבת הקלה העתידיים ועתיד להסיע כ 71 מיליון נוסעים בשנה! 
קו הרכבת תוכנן על מנת לתת מענה לעומסי התנועה המתגברים בגוש דן ובממשק מיטבי עם אמצעי התחבורה הציבורית הנוספים. 
מסלול הקו ייפגש עם תחנות השלום וסבידור מרכז של רכבת ישראל, ובכך יאפשר המשך נסיעה בין עירונית בקלות ובפשטות. בנוסף, לקו יש חיבוריות לתחנות קריית אריה והתחנה המרכזית בפתח תקווה.

באפליקציה זו תוכלו לקבל מידע בקלות ובמהירות על נסיעות לאורך 34 תחנות הרכבת הקלה העוברות בחמש ערים!

מה כוללת האפליקציה: 

*תכנון מסלולי נסיעה קצרים נוחים ובהתאם ליעד שביקשתם 
*מידע כללי על הדנקל
*חדשות ועדכונים 
* עדכוני זמן אמת – תמונת מצב מעודכנת בכל רגע נתון
* שירות לקוחות הכולל הגשת טפסים שונים און ליין
* כל המידע על התחנות במפלס הרחוב והתחנות התת קרקעיות 

אנו בטוחים כי שירות זה יביא בשורה חדשה לתושבי גוש דן ולמבקרים בה, שירות חדש שישדרג משמעותית את חווית הנסיעה 
נשמח לשמוע ולקבל תגובות והערות שיסייעו לנו להמשיך ולשדרג עבורכם את האפליקציה בהמשך. 

צוות הדנקל מאחל לכם נסיעה נעימה ובטוחה!
